thread.title_full: Great place to stay in Beijing - Review of Renaissance Beijing Wangfujing Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: fozziebear33
title: Great place to stay in Beijing -
text: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here. The service was great. We especially liked the concierge staff who helped us with everything we needed. The rooms were clean, quiet, and comfortable. We had a very nice corner room. The room service food was okay. The buffet and breakfast were good with a lot of variety. The location was central to what we wanted to do and see. We would definitely stay here again.
